benchmark_details.name: Defeasible Video Entailment (DVidE)
benchmark_details.overview: The DVidE benchmark introduces a new task that challenges models to dynamically revise inferences about video content based on textual updates, with annotations for strengthener and weakener relationships.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the ability of models to perform defeasible inference in video understanding tasks.

data.source: The dataset is derived from the VIOLIN dataset, which consists of video-and-language inference pairs.
data.annotation: Annotations were done by multiple annotators to classify updates as strengtheners or weakeners.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the standard evaluation frameworks for classification and generation tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics signify better model performance in classifying and generating accurate updates.
methodology.validation: Seen through experimental results demonstrating significant improvements in classification and generation tasks.
